column4: Fix some bugs of AI and delete useless code
fixing bugs with config.
don't throw unnecessary error message #XNG  happened if GELF message was given to handler pre-parsed. message was stored anyways. fixes #SERVER-63
bumped mongo driver to 2.7.1  and fixed some problems it introduced. replica set authentication working again. fixes #SERVER-61
don't throw unnecessary error message #XNG  happened if GELF message was given to handler pre-parsed. message was stored anyways. fixes #SERVER-63
- fixed a few minor problems

fixed missing creation of ElasticSearch mapping  index type 'message' did not get specialized mapping BECAUSE YOU BETTER CALL FLUSH ON THAT OutputStream. caused confusing bugs in the web interface lulz
fix for another observed problem
fix dependency bug in Makefile  fixes #SERVER-89
fix dependency bug in Makefile  fixes #SERVER-89
fix wrong debug output of syslog messages  fixes #SERVER-91
bugfix: GELF header decoding was not according to current GELF specs. now working with current gelf-rb but all other libraries will need an update
Merge pull request #2 from racker/fix_concurrent_error  Fix concurrency error in MessageCountWriterThread
Merge branch 'fix_concurrent_error' into ckdev
Fixing nonserializable CreateSessionRequest bean.  This lead to an error when trying to log in using the web interface.
Fixing serialization errors by using the same ObjectMapper config.
Fixing serialization errors by using the same ObjectMapper config.  (cherry picked from commit 54ec64040d0f8d97dc38df16e403da2746574852)
Fix AutoValue class name in SearchError

Use structured syslog parser from the NessComputing syslog4j fork.  Fixes parsing of structured data values that contain whitespace. This addresses issues from Graylog2/graylog2-server#845.  Parser and test code from NessComputing/syslog4j@038caf2.
URI encode the regex test string to avoid wrong test results.  If the regex test message contained a "%10"  the test result was off because of encoding problems.  Fixes Graylog2/graylog2-server#804
Unbreak URI builder by passing missing stream id parameter.  Fixes error after creating alert condition.  Fixes #891.
Fix more URL builder errors for the alerts management.  Related to #891.
Fix off-by-one error in SplitAndIndexExtractor#cut  Fixes #896
Update to gelfclient 1.1.0 to fix name resolving issue.  Fixes #882.

Use separate class loader for MessagePack objects.  The JavaassistTemplateBuilder used by MessagePack uses a sequence number for class naming and is not thread-safe. This leads to random class generation errors due to duplicate class names.  Avoid this by using a separate class loader for each MessagePack object.  Fixes #911.
Make type field in CreateConditionRequest Nullable.  This fixes an error when updating an alert condition.  Fixes #912.

Format error message when an input fails to start  To avoid repetition and provide a user friendly error message  we use the root cause of the exception when an input fails to start.  Fix Graylog2/graylog2-web-interface#1056
improve bootstrap error messages when journal directory or associated files aren't accessible  fixes #931
Merge pull request #954 from Graylog2/947-parse-errors  Fix error handling for search errors
Merge branch '947-parse-errors' into 1.0  Fixes Graylog2/graylog2-server#947

the NodeNotFoundException did not extend NotFoundException  so it wasn't properly mapped.  now requesting operations on non-existing nodes leads to a proper return code of 404 instead of the generic 500. the web interface now shows a proper error messages instead of an internal server error.  fixes Graylog2/graylog2-web-interface#1137
Add AMQP transport config option for discarding messages on error.  Fixes #1018.
Add AMQP transport config option for discarding messages on error.  Fixes #1018.
fix error site.

Fixing bug when an output which is added to multiple streams is deleted  In this case a stale reference is left for all but one stream  because the update is only updating the first document it finds.

Fixing bug when an output which is added to multiple streams is deleted  In this case a stale reference is left for all but one stream  because the update is only updating the first document it finds.  (cherry picked from commit a41f4fbfcbbcf4b7e075666e2897271b7c8fa34e)
use forked grok library to support type conversions   - also fixes locale problem for date converter  fixes #1064

Fixing incorrect alert backlog population and size calculation.  This affects only field value conditions. Range is now passed in when construction search queries  so null check for range is false and filter is appended. This is the least intrusive fix for this issue  we should take a look at the relevant code parts for 1.1.0 and make the filter generation code code more robust.
Merge pull request #1146 from Graylog2/issue-1143  Fix setting receive buffer size for UDP-based transports  fixes #1143
fix issue with backlog size and search limit
system throughput resource was returning 0 because of a Double vs Long issue  fixes Graylog2/graylog2-web-interface#1313
Merge pull request #1176 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1161  Update to syslog4j 0.9.53 to fix parsing structured syslog
Merge pull request #1178 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1101  Handle double values in greater/smaller stream matcher.
Merge pull request #1180 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1179  track metrics for the gelf chunk manager
Merge pull request #1182 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1159  Fix AlertCondition tests
Merge pull request #1183 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1010  Fix issue 1010
Merge pull request #1181 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1170  Add config option to change the default widget cache time  Fixes #1170
Merge pull request #1186 from Graylog2/fix-issue-537  Field content value alerts  Closes #1160  refs #537

Revert "Remove Jersey 1.x dependency from REST client"  This reverts commit 5a7811934941508ead0fe9f3874b98fd6bb5b8a0.  Reverting this commits fixes some issues with URL encoding. For example  colons were not properly escaped.  Fixes Graylog2/graylog2-web-interface#1356
Merge pull request #1190 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1334  Allow Message.RESERVED_SETTABLE_FIELDS fields set by a GELF message.

Allow Message.RESERVED_SETTABLE_FIELDS fields set by a GELF message.  Remove IllegalStateException if gl2_source_input or gl2_source_radio_input are already set but log a message on debug. This fixes a problem when receiving GELF messages which already have those fields. (i.e. forwarded GELF messages from another server)  Fixes Graylog2/graylog2-web-interface#1334
Merge pull request #1207 from Graylog2/fix-memory-visibility  Make RawMessageEvent's fields volatile to resolve cross-CPU visibility issues
Merge pull request #1206 from Graylog2/issue-1163  Fix message backlog in default body template in FormattedEmailAlertSender

Set node_id on the MessageInput in InputServiceImpl.getMessageInput().  This caused a problem that the node_id was set to null in the database when an input got updated. Before commit 286b7c3  a different code path was used to construct the updated input object  that's why the missing node_id setting in getMessageInput() wasn't noticed before.  Fixes #1210
Merge branch '1.1' into fix-index-retention-bugs

Change metric "org.graylog2.journal.oldest-segment" to Gauge<Date>  The metric "org.graylog2.journal.oldest-segment" used to be a `Gauge<DateTime>` which led to problems when recording the metrics to MongoDB via the `MongoDbMetricsReporter`.  Changing the Gauge type to `Date` resolves that issue without losing functionality.  Fixes #1228
Merge pull request #1237 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1456-stream-pause  allow users with stream:edit permissions to pause/resume streams
Log error message if there is a MongoDB connection error.  Fixes #1249
Log error message if there is a MongoDB connection error.  Fixes #1249  (cherry picked from commit c6d34eb460006510aa2b66145164395d7f7ebd74)
Merge branch 'master' into fix-index-retention-bugs
Merge branch 'master' into fix-index-retention-bugs

Revert "make RawMessageEvent's fields volatile to guard against cross-cpu visibility issues"  This did not fix anything so remove it to avoid performance degradation.  The fix for the issue we tried to solve got committed in f8d9391.  This reverts commit 769a2c15cfc8ed71126ce24af32db248740e46c5.

Revert "make RawMessageEvent's fields volatile to guard against cross-cpu visibility issues"  This did not fix anything so remove it to avoid performance degradation.  The fix for the issue we tried to solve got committed in f8d9391.  This reverts commit 769a2c15cfc8ed71126ce24af32db248740e46c5.  (cherry picked from commit ee223dd281cea9dc157ff682c16fc63b155781b0)  Refs #1286
Fixing error in test case.
Fix issues found by error-prone
Fixing error in test case.
Merge pull request #1308 from Graylog2/web-issue-1533  Fix dynamic keyword time-ranges for dashboard widgets created from content packs

Merge pull request #1308 from Graylog2/web-issue-1533  Fix dynamic keyword time-ranges for dashboard widgets created from content packs (cherry picked from commit d8ea2e6e979242552da998c3d3955b77be8cc993)
Merge pull request #1339 from Graylog2/issue-1105  Fix edge case in SyslogOctetCountFrameDecoder  Fixes #1105
support updating roles in rest client  fix exception when using Optional.get()  issue #1321 #951

increase timeout for CSV export request to Long.MAX_VALUE   - a value -1 will block browsers completely  which it shouldn't but it does.  - backend support for cancelling the connection/scroll is not existant  so an overly long timeout will not make it worse  - improve some debug output  fixes Graylog2/graylog2-web-interface#1478

print more details about raw messages containing illegal payload   - esp print journal offset  codec name  the remote address if available and the actual root cause to aid debugging  - both in online processing as well as the decode journal cli tool  fixes #1059
Merge pull request #1380 from Graylog2/web-issue-1565  Fix standard deviation statistical widget

Initialise persisted widgets with wrong timeranges  When a persisted widget contains an invalid timerange  initialise the widget nonetheless  so it can be edited or deleted from the web interface.  In that case  an error will be logged into the graylog server logs  and an exception will be raised when computing the value for the affected widgets.  Fixes Graylog2/graylog2-web-interface#1505
Merge pull request #1416 from Graylog2/issue-1410  do not let LDAP referral exception bubble out  this prevented authenticated users from logging if their groups could not be resolved Fixes #1410
Merge pull request #1418 from Graylog2/issue-1417  Fix isMatched results for OR streams
Merge pull request #1424 from Graylog2/issue-1423  Fix import of content packs containing outputs Fixes #1423
Merge pull request #1424 from Graylog2/issue-1423  Fix import of content packs containing outputs Fixes #1423 (cherry picked from commit 4c3d91abb8c2656e080dcaafa2f5fc7f01d4a284)

Use min/max instead of stats aggregation for index timestamp stats  Using the stats aggregation involved calculating unused values like sum and average. Additionally we changed the parsing of the min/max values from using the string representation to the numeric (double) representation which should eliminate some error conditions  especially with older Elasticsearch versions.  Fixes #1426
Merge pull request #1437 from Graylog2/issue-1434  Fix Stream#MatchingType handling when applying content packs
Merge pull request #1488 from Graylog2/issue-1462  Fix memory leak in GelfChunkAggregator

Check if group lookup worked to avoid a NPE  The group lookup can fail if the group belongs to a different domain and the connection user is not allowed to lookup details.  Log a message to DEBUG if the lookup failed to make this debuggable.  Fixes #1453
Update to netty-3.10.5.Final  This fixes a bug in SSL handling. See: http://netty.io/news/2015/10/13/3-10-5-Final.html
Update to netty-3.10.5.Final  This fixes a bug in SSL handling. See: http://netty.io/news/2015/10/13/3-10-5-Final.html  (cherry picked from commit b9f91a3a7dea2cb24e1da6f0eed5acb73e460b31)
Update to netty-3.10.5.Final  This fixes a bug in SSL handling. See: http://netty.io/news/2015/10/13/3-10-5-Final.html  (cherry picked from commit b9f91a3a7dea2cb24e1da6f0eed5acb73e460b31)
Fix error handling on field charts
Remove ESTimestampFixup command  The ESTimestampFixup was only used to fix a mapping problem when upgrading from Graylog 0.20.x or 0.90.x to Graylog 1.x.  Refs #728  refs #737.
Merge pull request #1612 from Graylog2/issue-1608  properly remove roles from users when the role is deleted (cherry picked from commit 71f3f2bc8a74dd997d7e28dbd5fdf128ec8ad72b)  Fixes #1608
Fix lint error
Fix lint errors on `StreamAlertsPage`
Fix styling issues on show dashboard page

Fix several errors in widget edit modal  - Use right key to access cache time - Use right key to access time range configuration - Clone state objects before modifying them (added function in   ObjectUtils to take care of that easily) - Use DateTime to parse and format times

Add default content-type to GettingStartedResource  If the default content-type for responses was missing  Jersey tried to use "text/xml" as default  which resulted in an error message:  MessageBodyWriter not found for media type=text/xml  Adding an explicit default ("application/json") fixes this issue.  Fixes #1700

Add default content-type to GettingStartedResource  If the default content-type for responses was missing  Jersey tried to use "text/xml" as default  which resulted in an error message:  MessageBodyWriter not found for media type=text/xml  Adding an explicit default ("application/json") fixes this issue.  Fixes #1700
Avoid duplicate node registration in NodeService  This fixes an issue where NodeService#registerServer() created a duplicate entry for a node instead of updating the existing one.
Merge pull request #1708 from Graylog2/fix-system-job-error-handling  Log error when a SystemJob throws an exception
Fix error loading inputs page for first time  Check if inputStates is set before filtering.
Merge pull request #1768 from Graylog2/issue-723  Fix Accept header for non-json endpoints in swagger ui
also guard against negative limit   - add test for negative limit  - actually test the explicit limit as well (so it doesn't get overridden by the default handling)  fixes issue #1775
fix wrong default of limit search parameter  the builder didn't properly default a 0 value to the actual default  fixes issue #1775
Merge pull request #1793 from Graylog2/issue-1775  Fix wrong default of limit search parameter in SearchesConfig.Builder
Always import ConfigurationForm with a named import  This avoids circular dependencies  resolving the issue #1789.  Fixes #1789
Fix eslint errors for index settings UI  Also remove inline styles and put them into a CSS file.
Merge pull request #1862 from Graylog2/issue-1857  Fix potential memory leak in Tools#decompressGzip() and Tools#decompressZlib()
Merge pull request #1864 from Graylog2/fix-remove-cached-widget-plugins  Do not cache widget plugins to avoid problems with external plugins

Fix stream search URL for "Replay search" functionality for widgets.  This fixes a bug  where a wrong URL is generated when the "Replay search" button is used on a dashboard widget that is scoped to a stream. This changeset also adds a redirect for legacy URLs.  Fixes #1835

Resorting from clearing metrics registrations to checking if logged in.  This fixes the issue where global throughput is not shown anymore after a logout/login-cycle  which is caused by cleared metrics not being re-registered due to single initialisation of GlobalThroughputStore.  Fixes #1876
Merge pull request #1873 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1248  Unify serialization of outputs.
Resolve issue described at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MASSEMBLY-728
Fix issue from https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MASSEMBLY-728
Resolves session id to username for fixing https://github.com/Graylog2/graylog2-server/issues/1815
Merge pull request #1907 from gitfrederic/fix_group_id_too_big  Fix issue about too large group IDs from https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MASSEMBLY-728
Fix problem getting streams URL  Function should use the same return type.

Refactorings after feedback  - Fix eslint errors - Move ISODurationUtils to util and use static functions instead of   mixin - Replace parseInt() with Number() - Refactor TimeRangeOptionsForm to take an array of objects - Fix state problems when editing time range options
Fix eslint spacing errors
Merge pull request #1935 from Graylog2/issue-1899  Use polyfills to fix IE support
Merge pull request #1937 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1831  Fix import of Graylog 1.x extractors and fix export format
Merge pull request #1938 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1785  Let field charts use the stream and time range of the current search

Do not use ES6 requires on typescript files  Using the StoreProvider to require typescript stores was returning a module instead of the store itself. By switching to typescript exports  this problem is solved.
Add jquery to vendor module  Fixes issues with events not being handled.

Do not use ES6 requires on typescript files  Using the StoreProvider to require typescript stores was returning a module instead of the store itself. By switching to typescript exports  this problem is solved.
Add jquery to vendor module  Fixes issues with events not being handled.

Do not use ES6 requires on typescript files  Using the StoreProvider to require typescript stores was returning a module instead of the store itself. By switching to typescript exports  this problem is solved.
Add jquery to vendor module  Fixes issues with events not being handled.
Reformat  optimize imports  fix small bug in ConfigurationForm.
Fix getting details about query parsing errors
Show error message on malformed search query  Add back the page displaying information about malformed search queries. Fixes #1896
Merge pull request #1983 from Graylog2/issue-1982  Fix Content-Type detection for web interface assets
Fix issue submitting user edit form  Check if fields are rendered before getting their values to submit the form. Fixes #1984

Fix problems editing user's self profile  Reader users hadn't got their self permissions to edit their profile and change their password. With these changes  these permissions are back on the list and reader users can edit their profiles again. Refs #1984
Merge pull request #1987 from Graylog2/issue-1984  Fix issues editing reader users profile
Fix eslint errors

Add Expect: 100-Continue support to HTTP input  Previously the input blindly answered with 202 Accepted but instead it should properly support the Expect header. Failing to respond correctly resulted in loss of messages because the client's expectation was broken.  Adding a HttpChunkAggregator fixes the issue while still allowing non-chunked requests to be sent.  fix #1939
Update OpenStreetMap tile URL  - Use SSL - Do not use shortened URL  as it has some certificate issues  Fixes Graylog2/graylog2-server#1994
Fix getting search parameters to create widget  There were some problems with the custom event  so I removed it from `AddToDashboardMenu`  as it is not needed currently. Fixes #1999 and #2001
Merge pull request #1990 from Graylog2/fix-issue-1974  Implement cluster metrics endpoint to fetch from all nodes
Merge pull request #2007 from Graylog2/fix-date-time-json-parsing  Fix timezone issues for date time processing in Jackson

Prevent NPE in UserImpl#getPermissions() if field is null (#2046)  * Prevent NPE in UserImpl#getPermissions() if field is null * log other exceptions as errors as well to help tracking down problems  Fixes #2045
Fix some styling issues

Delaying requests for stale session id while waiting for relogin.  This also delays the initialization of some stores  preventing errors where first store initialization fails because of invalid session id  so the store never loads.  Fixing some linter hints while on the way.  Fixes #2059  #1891.

Fix change password form (#2105)  * Show old password input when user edits their own account * Fix condition to display this field. * Change server response when old password is wrong * When users change their own password  return a 400 error if they did not provide the current (old) password  or if it was incorrect. * Improve displayed errors on user edit forms  Fixes #2103
Fixing spacing for getting started error message.

Improve robustness for unreachable nodes (#2206)  * Check for null values in response maps.  * Fixing linter hints.  * Make `SystemJobsComponent` resilient against unreachable nodes.  * Showing error instead of spinners for overview of unreachable node.  * Make logging page resilient against unreachable nodes.  * Change a bit the wording of PageErrorOverview

Fix URL require on NotFoundPage.css (#2212)  Using `~images` fails to resolve the right directory when compiling the plugins source in production mode.  This is an issue compiling our plugins since a1dbc51  as the css file was not being required by a plugin before that.

Fix URL require on NotFoundPage.css (#2212)  Using `~images` fails to resolve the right directory when compiling the plugins source in production mode.  This is an issue compiling our plugins since a1dbc51  as the css file was not being required by a plugin before that. (cherry picked from commit 5384df2599cba219eccdea2599b6a3b0bada2a98)
Update gelfclient to 1.4.0 (#2310)  Fixes memory issue caused by writing to quickly to netty Channels.  See https://github.com/Graylog2/gelfclient/pull/24

Update gelfclient to 1.4.0 (#2310)  Fixes memory issue caused by writing to quickly to netty Channels.  See https://github.com/Graylog2/gelfclient/pull/24 (cherry picked from commit baee87f38e96cec6764bcceca0efb7da1e005419)
Upgrade to Kafka 0.9.0.1 (#1912)  * Upgrade to Kafka 0.9.0.1 * fix metric type problem with lambda expression

Update search query on SearchStore component  When a search did not return results  clicking on the "Search" navigation menu  does not reset the search query being used in `SearchStore`.  Removing the query from the component state fixes part of problem  as the search query is now updated when the component refreshes the data.  Refs #2379

Report syntax error if search query contains slash  When the search query contains an unescaped slash  calling to `generateParseException()` throws a NullPointerException. We solve it by catching the exception and let the normal program flow to continue  which at that point will return the syntax error.  Fixes #2372

Report syntax error when search query contains unescaped slash (#2450)  When the search query contains an unescaped slash  calling to `generateParseException()` throws a NullPointerException. We solve it by catching the exception and let the normal program flow to continue  which at that point will return the syntax error.  Fixes #2372
Add missing attributes to user state in UserForm (#2485)  Fixes issue where external users got the password change form.  Fixes #2124

Improve overflow behaviour on search results table (#2483)  * Move search results table styling together * Reformat ResultTable component * Let search results table scroll on overflow   When many fields are selected on the search sidebar  allow the search   results table to overflow horizontally  and also avoid some styling   issues when doing so.  Fixes #2464
Fix group membership lookup if DN contains whitespace (#2484)  Normalize the DN before comparing the strings to avoid mapping problems if the DNs have different whitespace formatting.  Fixes #1790
Update jQuery UI (#2491)  * Update to jQuery UI 1.12  Pin version so updates do not break the code again.  * Fix lint errors on SourceLineChart

change plugin rest resource injection to use Class instances  using the actual resource instances caused injection of all the dependencies  even when we don't need the actual instance at all the registration simply needs to have the class. this also prevents early injection of objects which have a lifecycle but don't manage it (this continues to be a problem  but cannot be solved on this level)

Set __webpack_public_path__ early  Move logic setting `__webpack_public_path__` to its own file  that needs to be loaded before anything else  avoiding issues with assets.  Also use uri-js to concatenate the app prefix  avoiding generating URIs with double slashes at the end.

Fix issues with app prefix (#66)  * Use core Routes instead of literals   This allows us to prefix routes if needed. * Make plugin aware of __webpack_public_path__ setting  Refs Graylog2/graylog2-server#2564

Move Error Prone into default build profile  (#2575)  * Move errorprone to default build profile  * Add missing @Override to MessageInput#stop()  * Add missing @Override to JournalMessages  * Fix errorprone warnings
Mark message offset as committed in case of a decoding error (#2643)  This fixes an edge case where the journal grows when there is only one input and no message can be decoded.  Fixes #2627
Reformatting component  adding error handler for fetching dashboard. (#2703)  * Reformatting component  adding error handler for fetching dashboard.  * Fixing typo.

Styling of decorator list (#2744)  * Do not move decorator help link with first decorator   Using padding with the scrollable list item takes that space as part of   the preview that gets dragged  and in this case it includes the help   link.    This change gives height to the help link container instead  fixing the   display issue. * Fix scrolling on decorator list  Fixes #2743

Remove ldap settings check from authenticators (#2820)  we no longer lock external accounts when ldap is disabled because other authenticators can also create external users now if people require this we need to track which authenticator created the account in the first place  but that's too large a change for a bug fix release  fixes #2817

Add ClusterConfigService#get(String  Class<T>) method (#2822)  The new ClusterConfigService#get(String  Class<T>) method takes the key of the cluster config object in the database as an argument.  This makes it possible to fix some problems with @JsonSubtype usage.

Use another get() method instead of getPayload()  The new get() method takes the key of the cluster config object in the database as an argument. This makes it possible to fix some problems with JsonSubtype usage.

use shared classloader in graylog-server  Since this plugin is providing pipeline functions  it needs to see other plugins  which is what `isolated=true` prevents.  Fixes https://github.com/Graylog2/graylog2-server/issues/2978
Use custom Grizzly error page to prevent XSS (#3172)  Refs https://java.net/jira/browse/GRIZZLY-1718 Refs https://java.net/jira/browse/JERSEY-3050  Fixes #3171

Fix LDAP settings titles (#3174)  In Chrome 55  legend elements in the LDAP settings page have an incorrect width. This is most likely due to a bug in this Chrome version (they look fine in other browsers and also in previous Chrome versions). Either way  we can fix the issue by wrapping those legends in an actual bootstrap column.
Remove TODO about ZonedDateTime in IndexSetConfig  The issue has been resolved in #3198
Remove TODO about ZonedDateTime in IndexSetConfig  The issue has been resolved in #3198
Remove TODO about ZonedDateTime in IndexSetConfig  The issue has been resolved in #3198
Remove TODO about ZonedDateTime in IndexSetConfig  The issue has been resolved in #3198

Fix problems rendering object fields (#3106)  Some messages may contain objects as field values  and we need to properly convert them into strings that can be rendered by react.  This commit changes the way we convert values into strings  relying on `JSON.stringify()` to do it.  Refs Graylog2/graylog-plugin-beats#3
Escape search query when using surrounding search (#3314)  Fixes problems when using file paths that need to be escaped.  Fixes #3287
Use custom Grizzly error page to prevent XSS  (#3428)  Refs https://java.net/jira/browse/GRIZZLY-1718 Refs https://java.net/jira/browse/JERSEY-3050  Fixes #3171 Refs #3172 Refs #2863
Cleanup web assets when calling mvn clean (#3456)  Fixes the problem that old web assets will be included in the JAR files.

2.2 updates  Since 2.2 the generate-resources must be run for both projects  otherwise the vendor bundles aren't generated  which causes the build to fail early.  fixes https://github.com/Graylog2/graylog2-server/issues/3010
Fix various deprecation and Errorprone warnings
Fix various deprecation and Errorprone warnings
Fix various deprecation and Errorprone warnings (#3488)  * Fix various deprecation and Errorprone warnings  * Ignore Errorprone warnings for generated code
Fix FindBugs warnings with level "HIGH"

Fix PMD and FindBugs warnings (#3493)  * Fix PMD warnings  * Remove anonymous statically initialized collections  * Optimize imports  * Fix FindBugs warnings with level "HIGH"  * Delete unused declarations and classes
Reformat old components  This commit reformat the code of some old components by:   - Using ES2015 modules   - Adding prop types   - Fixing linter errors   - Removing 'use strict' declaration
Reformat old components (#3498)  This commit reformat the code of some old components by:   - Using ES2015 modules   - Adding prop types   - Fixing linter errors   - Removing 'use strict' declaration
Fix lint errors in ShowDashboardPage
Fix lint errors in ShowDashboardPage

Remove output to STDERR for default profile (#3589)  Before this change  IntelliJ interpreted the output to STDERR from ESLint sourcing the webpack config as an error. This change removes the output for the default profile to fix this.

Fix error when clicking on open indices modal  Since react-bootstrap 0.29  the event handlers used for `onClick` and `onSelect` expect the event argument to be passed in a different position.  This change will check if any of the two first arguments is an event  and stop its propatation if that's the case.

Fix error when clicking on open indices modal  Since react-bootstrap 0.29  the event handlers used for `onClick` and `onSelect` expect the event argument to be passed in a different position.  This change will check if any of the two first arguments is an event  and stop its propatation if that's the case.

Fix error when clicking on open indices modal  Since react-bootstrap 0.29  the event handlers used for `onClick` and `onSelect` expect the event argument to be passed in a different position.  This change will check if any of the two first arguments is an event  and stop its propatation if that's the case.

Fix error handling in ldap groups component  - Do not try to render an object  as that doesn't work - Display no configuration message when server returns 400  as that only   happens when LDAP is not correctly configured. That message is a bit   more clear and less scary

Upgrade to Mockito 2.7.20  Release notes: https://github.com/mockito/mockito/blob/9b98d71fa2444b0ebc35265d79458e5432cb5396/doc/release-notes/official.md#2720-2017-03-29-1723-utc  This changeset also fixes some issues with Jackson being unable to serialize the mocked IndexSet used in 2 tests in HTTPAlarmCallbackTest.

Switch RoleResponse to java.util.Optional to fix serialization (#3915)  This fixes a StackOverflowError when accessing the /roles API endpoint. It looks like the guava Optional class cannot be serialized by jackson.  Fixes #3913
Fix issue with jumping cursor in JSONValueInput

Fix handling of "match all"/"match either" (#193)  The pipeline interpreter had a bug regarding the handling of the "match all" and "match either" statements which caused pipelines containing stages with "match all" to continue processing even if not all rules in the stage were executed.  Fixes Graylog2/graylog2-server#3924

Fix handling of "match all"/"match either"  The pipeline interpreter had a bug regarding the handling of the "match all" and "match either" statements which caused pipelines containing stages with "match all" to continue processing even if not all rules in the stage were executed.  Fixes Graylog2/graylog2-server#3924

Allow manual cache purge via UI and API (#3967)  * Allow manual cache purge via UI and API  Also unbreak cache purging by using the data adapter id for the prefix everywhere.  Closes #3962  * Remove debug console.log statements  * Fix API description for cache purge endpoint

Fix issues loading web interface in Firefox (#3002)  * Update superagent-bluebird-promise  The logs an error instead of throwing the exception seen on #3001.  * Enable cancellation on promises  Pass `cancellation` option to bluebird to enable cancelling promises from reflux.  Refs #3001

Correctly initialize the "pageSize" prop in MessageTablePaginator (#4209)  Fixes an issue when no "pageSize" prop is provided. This broke in #4160.

Correctly initialize the "pageSize" prop in MessageTablePaginator (#4209)  Fixes an issue when no "pageSize" prop is provided. This broke in #4160.  (cherry picked from commit 5a22fc22bafd03907385bebcb63d15559e8b0964)

Fix chart size issue where the chart gets smaller every new render  We have been passing this.CHART_MARGINS into the chart and dc.js was modifying the values. So on every new chart render the chart got smaller.  Use an immutable value for this.CHART_MARGINS.

Fix terms/termsHistogram bug with stacked fields  Wrap terms query with stacked fields in an additional filter to ensure that the main and stacked fields actually exist in the message. Otherwise we would get "null" values in the result.

Remove "alt key submits" functionality from histogram (#4243)  The old jQuery code could submit the search form directly when the alt key was pressed. Ever since moving to react this was broken because the code cannot submit the form anymore.  This commit removes the useless code to avoid a JavaScript error  Fixes #4214

Remove "alt key submits" functionality from histogram (#4243)  The old jQuery code could submit the search form directly when the alt key was pressed. Ever since moving to react this was broken because the code cannot submit the form anymore.  This commit removes the useless code to avoid a JavaScript error  Fixes #4214  (cherry picked from commit b8fec02eb4be5b320d84102dfb1c3c7740b7e5fc)
Fix Timezone Problem  In CST  when aggregation with day  the results start with 8:00 CST instead of 0:00 CST. That is the problem of Graylog2 doesn't send timezone information to ES. Fix it.
